---
title: "tidycensus Examples"
---

Here's an example of getting State Population Estimates from the 2020 Decennial 
Census using the `tidycensus` package: 
```{r}
#| message: false
library(dplyr)
library(tidycensus)

pop2020 <- get_decennial(
  geography = "state",
  variables = "P1_001N",
  year = 2020) %>%
  mutate(year = 2020, variable = "population")

pop2020
```
